::Savanna::

She watched as HotRod drove to the base.  She noticed his new body 
and knew it would suit him well.  She was laying in the lower 
branches of a tree a few paces from the Cybertron Fire.  She twitched 
her tail and let out a soft purr.  She kept an eye out for any bot's 
that weren't Maximal to show up.  

(If I missed a post or two, I appologize.  I had 327 email this 
morning to go through.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod came out of the ship. He was in a new body.
> It was a replica of his old Autobot body.
> Except this one was scaled down to Maximal size, its lasers had been
> replaced with plasma charges, optic laser, and two rocket launchers 
have
> been installed, there was now a on board computer, and a Maximal 
symbol
> where the Autobot symbol once was.
> "Well lets give it a try. Vehical mode." Hot Rod transformes to the
> futuristic sports car he once was, and drives off towards the
> Cybertronian Fire.
